text: Urgent research is needed to test treatments for #COVID19. I’m honored to be involved in this Systematic Review of Individual Patient Data #IPD of #Hydroxychloroquine/#Chloroquine for #Coronavirus in a partnership between @CebmOxford and @OxfordBrazilEBM: https://t.co/jXiKSI7Qt7 https://t.co/xWaJMKpPCf
